pages.text: Our Story Benny's was born in a small town that loves giant pizza. Since 2011, we have grown into many more great towns with 35 unique Benny's serving quick, quality meals at great prices. Each slice shop has it's own name and it's own chill vibe that reflects the downtowns that we call home. Come out, grab a drink, embrace our town, and find out why 28" pizza is the perfect size for slices. Read More Which State?
